body.name: Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Toaster Oven, Brushed Stainless Steel, BOV860BSS, Medium

features: The Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer with Element iQ System delivers top performance and versatility allowing you to air fry and choose from 11 cooking functions; Use super convection to reduce cooking time by up to 30% and deliver crispy air fried foods

ELEMENT iQ SYSTEM: Using 5 independent quartz elements, smart algorithms steer power to where and when it's needed to create the ideal cooking environment; Sensing and digital PID temperature control eliminates cold spots for precise and even cooking

DEDICATED AIR FRY SETTING: The Smart Oven Air Fryer can turn out guilt free French fries, chicken wings and so much more; Higher temperatures combined with super convection (maximized air flow) deliver delicious, crispy golden air fried foods
SUPER CONVECTION TECHNOLOGY: Convection can reduce cooking time by up to 30%; It speeds the cooking process by raising the hotter air and sinking colder less dense air for quicker heating

11 COOKING FUNCTIONS: Super versatile countertop oven and air fryer with 11 cooking functions to guide you to perfection: Toast, Bagel, Broil, Bake, Roast, Warm, Pizza, Air Fry, Reheat, Cookies and Slow Cook
LARGE CAPACITY: Large 18.9 x 16.5 x 10.9 inch interior with enough room for 6 slices of bread, 13 inch pizza, roast chicken, a 9 cup muffin tray and even for slow cooking with a 4.4 qt Dutch oven

INTERIOR OVEN LIGHT: Integrated oven light automatically turns on at the end of the cooking cycle to help you see inside; It an be turned on at any time to see your progress; Replaceable componentry like your regular large oven

LCD DISPLAY: LCD display to easily access the built in smart functionality, choose from 11 smart cooking functions; The LCD also indicates when pre-heat has completed and automatically begins to count down on the cooking time for perfect results
INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: Air Fry basket; Enamel Roasting Pan; 13 inch Non-Stick Pizza Pan; Wire Rack and Broiling Rack
WARRANTY: 2 Year Limited Product Warranty; Power: 1800 Watts; Voltage: 120 Volts
body.description: The Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer with 11 smart cooking functions including Air Fry The Smart Oven Air Fryer powered by our Element iQ system delivers maximum performance and versatility. Smart algorithms replicate the ideal cooking environment for air fry and 10 additional cooking techniques. Higher temperatures and super convection speeds up cooking time with great crispness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaced an older toaster oven...
reviews.reviewText: I replaced an older Cuisinart toaster oven with this beast and I am very happy with the purchase. It does a great job heating up French fries and doing things like crisping Brussels sprouts. The blue color is also very stylish and fits in great in our kitchen. Note that even though this isn't the XL version, it's still chonky; make sure you measure your counter space to ensure there is adequate room. I have even baked bread in it with very good results.Pros:- Heats up very fast- Very even heat, makes great toast- Multiple shelf positions help getting good results.- Air fry basket is really convenient for multiple uses.- The "Super Convection" setting is very useful to get even cooking.- Lots of cooking modes/settings- Very well insulated, does not radiate a lot of heat.- Quiet, even with convection runningCons:- It's very big- Lots of accessories that you will need to find a place for- Toast "shade" controls aren't great at predicting toast results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally. After four other brands. The countertop oven of my dreams.
reviews.reviewText: This is my fourth attempt to find a countertop oven/AF that I like. This one is going to work beautifully. It does pretty much everything well. Beautifully designed. Intuitive to use. And the cooking - on every function - just is perfect. I haven’t had an issue with anything I’ve tried to cool.My only two negatives - and they are small. I wish the light stayed on a bit longer (or a way you can keep it on) - and it can be a bit loud at startup - but that goes away quickly.Stop wasting your money on inferior products - and just get this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Impressed so Far
reviews.reviewText: We just received ours a few days ago and finally tried it out last night and today. Frozen pizza was up first. The instruction manual is very thorough and well written with clear instructions. It's really easy to set the appropriate function, time and temperature, if not quite intuitive. I can see the learning curve will be very quick. The pizza was evenly baked, the crust was nice and crispy and the toppings were perfectly heated & melted - even with us having added extra toppings of our own. Today, we had to try frozen French fries with the airfry setting and the reheat function for our leftover pizza. Again, it was really easy, I love how the panel clearly shows preheat and how the alert sounds are different for both preheat alert and cooking timer. The fries didn't brown, but were perfectly crispy. The reheat function also worked beautifully. I could have set the time for slightly less time, but again, thenpizza was still crispy, without being overcooked and everything was uniformly reheated. I have some chicken thawing now so I can try air frying it for dinner. I can hardly wait to see how that turns out. We've been toaster oven users for years, we just prefer having the additional functionality and use it for so many things. This appliance is attractive, works well and we are very impressed so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this oven! It is just the right size and I use it far more often than I thought I would. The controls are easy and very intuitive, and I am surprised at how quiet it is. It preheats quickly, cooks evenly, and is simply great to use. I'm happy that I won't need to use my big ovens as much, especially during the summer. There are lots of this kind of oven out there that cost less, but this one is worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Multifunctional Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: Fits on my counter; use it for air frying, toasting, pizza, and baking. Takes a bit to figure out ideal length of time - trial and error; rule of thumb - begin by using 20 percent less time than what food packaging says as it's compact and runs hot - then check to see if it requires more time. First few attempts I overcooked pizza, fries, and a few other food products not utilizing this methodology. Dials are easy to use and time/temp can be changed quickly (when warm up beep sounds timer begins immediately, but can readjust time once food is inserted into oven). Sounds off when finished - a little loud. Overall, high quality metal product. Includes several handy trays - accessories for various cooking types. I also purchased a Breville cookbook containing various scrumptious recipes. Use a lot with safe silicone baking dishes and mats - although they're hot when removed from oven - utilize gloves or other protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much to love about this toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: For two people this is just the right size. I've used it a few times in the few days I've had it and the only problem is that I have been setting it to cook too long. It cooks things so much more quickly than I expect. I'm sure it is that the box is so small and concentrates the heat. It is so easy to clean, even when the heating elements get goo on them. I'm so pleased with this. On top of it all, the red is a lovely color and the things looks swanky in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy addition to kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Use ours often. Heats up quickly, within minutes, and much better than having to wait for whole actual oven to preheat. Dials make it easy for users to choose what they want to do and “rotate” reminder beeper is nice. Air fryer option works great, crispy potato chunks and veggies are quick to make. Good assortment of pans included, haven’t felt like anything else was needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best air fryer toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough about this smart oven. Not only does it look sleek, it is a workhorse for the size. We haven’t gone a day without using this little guy. Have bought items just to test out its capabilities in air frying. I’ve baked cookies air fried fish sticks and leftovers and this have exceeded my expectations. Easy to use, versatile, compact for small counters. It has a lot of smart features like the removable crumb tray and the oven light.
Great look in red velvet cake color. Great function. 👍

I've had this oven 10 days now and I know it's going to be invaluable!! Air Fryer cooked my drumsticks to perfection. Pizza function was awesome. A quiche was baked perfectly and reheated without the crust turning to mush! Our Thanksgiving dinner was reheated to the right temperature without drying it out. And .... it toasts perfectly!Easy to clean. Easy to follow settings.Highly recommend this Breville machine. Happy cooking!!
Love this unit! Does everything well.

I bought this for our son because we like ours so much. It toasts many slices of bread very evenly. We use ours frequently as an oven, love the reheat setting. I don't use the air fryer too often but our grandsons use theirs.

The media could not be loaded. Le Four est d'une précision remarquable pour les degrés atteints, Se que plusieurs autres marques ne peuvent offrir ou égaler… Il remplace aussi bien mon four conventionnel dans plusieurs tâches ce qui est beaucoup plus pratique, la circulation d'air chaud cuit à la perfection des aliments comme le poulet ou le boeuf sans aucun problème et laisse la viande tendre et délicieuse. Il peut servir de mijoteuse ou de déshydrateur des fonctions additionnelles qui sont un plus.Je l'utilise aussi pour la pizza congelée, vous savez comme moi combien il est dur de tout cuire uniformément la pizza quand elle est congelée et bien sûr la grille du bas sur la plaque qui est inclus et le réglage pizza elle cuit d'une façon parfaite sinon mieux qu'un grand fourLe cadran ACL est très simple et les touches sont conviviales et bien pensées une autre gros plus.Plusieurs parles du son qu'il émet comme dans la vidéo, je ne trouve pas si pire que çaBref il ma surpris de bien des façonsThe oven has remarkable precision for the degrees reached, which several other brands cannot offer or match... It also replaces my conventional oven in several tasks which is much more practical, the circulation of hot air cooks at the same time. perfects foods like chicken or beef without any problem and leaves the meat tender and delicious. It can be used as a slow cooker or dehydrator, additional functions which are a plus.I also use it for frozen pizza, you know like me how hard it is to cook the pizza evenly when it is frozen and of course the bottom rack on the plate which is included and the pizza setting it cooks evenly perfect way if not better than a large ovenThe LCD dial is very simple and the buttons are user-friendly and well thought out another big plus.Many people talk about the sound it emits like in the video, I don't think it's that bad
